channel.title: Best WW2 RTS?
channel.description: I'm looking for a good WW2 RTS. With good I mean as realistic as possible. A game where strategy actually matters, where spam building one type of unit will mean defeat. A game where you can be Allies or Axis. I've played Empire Earth, but I want to try something else.

item.title: Best WW2 RTS?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’m looking for a good WW2 RTS. With good I mean as realistic as possible. A game where strategy actually matters, where spam building one type of unit will mean defeat. A game where you can be Allies or Axis. I’ve played Empire Earth, but I want to try something else.

Read full topic
